property.name: offer
property.value: Become a White River Citizen

property.name: name
property.value: Declare your citizenship to White River

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Obtain Your White River Citizen Crate

property.name: description_key
property.value: Declare your citizenship with White River settlements by crafting a +Declaration_Of_Citizenship. In return, you will receive a crate to use in a recipe to select which citizen equipment you will pursue. Destroy the crate to end quest.

property.name: offer
property.value: There is a crate of modded weapons at the Trader that a guy named Leon left behind and hasn't come back for in a long time. You can have one of these weapons once you provide pistols that the Trader can hand out to other survivors.

property.name: name
property.value: Pay-it-forward to obtain Leon's Modded SMG

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Craft the +Writ_Of_Leon

property.name: description_key
property.value: Collect the needed weapons and craft a +Writ_Of_Leon to receive your SMG. You also will receive a small gift to help you re-establish your homestead.

property.name: offer
property.value: There is a crate of digging tools a woman named Danara left at the Trader some time ago and seems to have abandoned. You can have a pair of these tools once you provide the trader with iron replacements.

property.name: name
property.value: Quest to obtain Danara's Flaming Dig Tools

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Craft the +Writ_Of_Danara

property.name: description_key
property.value: Collect the needed items and resources to craft a +Writ_Of_Danara and receive your set of flaming dig tools. You also will receive a small gift to help you re-establish your homestead.

property.name: offer
property.value: The Trader is having problems outfitting survivors with bows. If you can provide bows and enough wood for their bow-making class, they will give you the famed Bambi Killer compound bow in exchange for your assistance.

property.name: name
property.value: Quest to obtain Bambi Killer Compound Bow

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Craft the +Writ_Of_Bambi

property.name: description_key
property.value: Collect the needed items and resources to craft a +Writ_Of_Bambi and receive your compound bow. You also will receive a small gift to help you re-establish your homestead.

property.name: offer
property.value: The Trader offered you his own homemade secret recipe to create what he calls Kuvas Red Armor. But first you must prove yourself worthy.

property.name: name
property.value: Quest to craft Legendary Kuvas Red Armor

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Craft the +Writ_Of_Kuva

property.name: description_key
property.value: Collect the needed items and resources to craft a +Writ_Of_Kuva and receive your armor. You also will receive a small gift to help you re-establish your homestead.

property.name: offer
property.value: In the wake of the event, rumors circulated about a legendary axe created by a master craftsman. The White River colonies banded together to locate this craftsman only to arrive at just the right moment to save the craftsman's life. In repayment, he provided the plans so any White River citizen can reproduce his famous axe. You too can build this axe, with a lot of effort.

property.name: name
property.value: Quest to build Legendary Tazas Axe

property.name: subtitle_key
property.value: Quest for Legendary Taza Axe

property.name: description_key
property.value: Collect the needed resources and craft a +Writ_Of_Taza to receive your axe. You also will receive a weapon and ammo as well as a small gift to help you take on any who would stand in your way.
